snippet.title: ULTRAKILL Demake: RETROKILL 10 - 0-2, Swordsmachine, Bloodstains, Alt Weapons
snippet.description:
GET RETROKILL HERE: https://pedroleum.itch.io/retrokill

It's been a while, but I've been working on 0-2 for RETROKILL, while improving in game systems. You can also see the improved camera system and omnidirectional aiming. Also I fixed loads of small bugs, like that really annoying platform one where you clip through the wall.
Most of these problems occurred due to the rushed development of the project at the start, as I didn't think it would garner so much attention, and had only a small scope for the project. These issues have been mostly ironed out and progress should pick up over Summer.
Thanks for sticking around!
